tools.name: get_aggs
tools.description: List aggregate bars for a ticker over a given date range in custom time window sizes.

tools.name: list_aggs
tools.description: Iterate through aggregate bars for a ticker over a given date range.

tools.name: get_grouped_daily_aggs
tools.description: Get grouped daily bars for entire market for a specific date.

tools.name: get_daily_open_close_agg
tools.description: Get daily open, close, high, and low for a specific ticker and date.

tools.name: get_previous_close_agg
tools.description: Get previous day's open, close, high, and low for a specific ticker.

tools.name: list_trades
tools.description: Get trades for a ticker symbol.

tools.name: get_last_trade
tools.description: Get the most recent trade for a ticker symbol.

tools.name: get_last_crypto_trade
tools.description: Get the most recent trade for a crypto pair.

tools.name: list_quotes
tools.description: Get quotes for a ticker symbol.

tools.name: get_last_quote
tools.description: Get the most recent quote for a ticker symbol.

tools.name: get_last_forex_quote
tools.description: Get the most recent forex quote.

tools.name: get_real_time_currency_conversion
tools.description: Get real-time currency conversion.

tools.name: list_universal_snapshots
tools.description: Get universal snapshots for multiple assets of a specific type.

tools.name: get_snapshot_all
tools.description: Get a snapshot of all tickers in a market.

tools.name: get_snapshot_direction
tools.description: Get gainers or losers for a market.

tools.name: get_snapshot_ticker
tools.description: Get snapshot for a specific ticker.

tools.name: get_snapshot_option
tools.description: Get snapshot for a specific option contract.

tools.name: get_snapshot_crypto_book
tools.description: Get snapshot for a crypto ticker's order book.

tools.name: get_market_holidays
tools.description: Get upcoming market holidays and their open/close times.

tools.name: get_market_status
tools.description: Get current trading status of exchanges and financial markets.

tools.name: list_tickers
tools.description: Query supported ticker symbols across stocks, indices, forex, and crypto.

tools.name: get_ticker_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific ticker.

tools.name: list_ticker_news
tools.description: Get recent news articles for a stock ticker.

tools.name: get_ticker_types
tools.description: List all ticker types supported by Polygon.io.

tools.name: list_splits
tools.description: Get historical stock splits.

tools.name: list_dividends
tools.description: Get historical cash dividends.

tools.name: list_conditions
tools.description: List conditions used by Polygon.io.

tools.name: get_exchanges

tools.description: Get fundamental financial data for companies.

tools.description: Retrieve short interest data for stocks.

tools.name: list_short_volume
tools.description: Retrieve short volume data for stocks.

tools.name: list_treasury_yields
tools.description: Retrieve treasury yield data.

tools.name: list_inflation

tools.description: Get snapshots for futures contracts.

results.name: Microsoft Corp
results.description: Microsoft develops and licenses consumer and enterprise software. It is known for its Windows operating systems and Office productivity suite. The company is organized into three equally sized broad segments: productivity and business processes (legacy Microsoft Office, cloud-based Office 365, Exchange, SharePoint, Skype, LinkedIn, Dynamics), intelligence cloud (infrastructure- and platform-as-a-service offerings Azure, Windows Server OS, SQL Server), and more personal computing (Windows Client, Xbox, Bing search, display advertising, and Surface laptops, tablets, and desktops).
